name: Isekai Farming game
description:
Gamepad is required. Keyboard/Mouse controls are WIP

Isekai farm (temp) is a fantasy themed farming game. You play as the daughter of  a fief owner who sent you to a faraway property as punishment for lazing around at home.  Arriving at the location, the protagonist learns that other people have already settled down in the area.

Build a farm, make a name of yourself or treat all of this as an extended vacation.

Expected playtime for completing all content is 30-60 minutes.
As the game is a work in progress, there will be placeholder assets and there may be bugs.

As part of the public playtest, please fill out the feedback questionnaire: https://forms.gle/i446cZnDCeVuAJTN8

The game is a solo project as part of my master's thesis.
Developer: https://twitter.com/FattyBot
